participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and detail-oriented, Emily has a compassionate nature but struggles with certain aspects of her career choice.
participant_1.background: I work in a doctors office. I only wear silver jewelry. I am studying to be a dental hygienist but I hate seeing patients saliva. I have a rose tattooed on my right ankle. There are thorns tattooed on my toes.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Jake enjoys interacting with others and is always on the move.
participant_2.background: I work as a waitress. I have 5 brothers and sisters. I live in north dakota. I ride a bike. I like to draw.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. I work in a doctor's office and I'm studying to be a dental hygienist.
Hi, I'm participant_2. I work as a waitress.
Cool. What do you like about being a waitress?
I like the interaction with people, and I like that I'm always busy.
That's cool. I like being busy too. I also like the idea of being a dental hygienist. I'm just not sure if I can handle seeing patients saliva.
So, what's your favorite thing to do when you're not working?
I like to draw. I also like to go for walks and spend time with my family.
Me too. I like to draw, I like to bike, and I like to spend time with my family.
Cool. It sounds like we have a lot in common.
Maybe we could hang out sometime.
Great. I'll text you my number.
